text: Jahdet ar Öebbi lêeqq ujahed iS. Neppa Ifren ikwen. Ur kwen Ihejjen ara di ddin, ddin ubabat wen Ibôahim. Neppa, i wen isemman, zik, imvuâen. Deg waya, ad yili Umazan d anagi nnwen, u a ppilim d inagan n medden. Ihi, ééallet, zekkit, teîîfem di Öebbi. Neppa d Bab nnwen. D Bab amxallef, d Asellak amxallef
